settings.heading: How it works
settings.text1: Get a prescription through your doctor or book an appointment with one of our doctors.
settings.text2: Place your order via our online store and upload a copy of your prescription.
settings.text3: We will prepare your order and get it delivered to your door within 48 hours*.

settings.heading: Am I elligible?
settings.text:
Cannabinoids including CBD and THC, extracted from the cannabis plant under strict medical supervision, have been shown to work very well on the symptoms of some chronic medical conditions that conventional prescription medicines have been ineffective at treating.

​So, if prescription medicines from your doctor aren’t working for you, Medicinal Cannabis may be a great natural option.

settings.heading: Pain
settings.content: CBD can be used to treat most types of chronic pain and improve quality of life.

settings.heading: Anxiety
settings.content: Anxiety is a very common condition and CBD has proved to be very effective in treating it.

settings.heading: Insomnia
settings.content: CBD under the expert advice of your doctor, can be a very effective long term management.

settings.heading: Mental Health
settings.content: Anxiety is a very common condition and CBD has proved to be very effective in treating it.

settings.heading: How we can help
settings.content:
The most common conditions we treat with medicinal cannabis are listed below.
Feel free to discuss any other conditions with us. We will give you an honest opinion as to whether medicinal cannabis would be worth trying.
